Founded in 2016, the Group has presence across South and Southeast Asia, Latin America and Greater China. You will work closely with sales leadership to identify skill gaps, refine sales methodologies, and foster a culture of continuous improvement. Why You Should Join Us • Competitive compensation package • Private medical insurance • Free lunch provided with amazing choices • A collaborative and innovative work environment where your ideas are valued • Office situated near MRT station See more

description: About the job Job Summary: The Collections Quality Analyst ensures the quality, compliance, and overall effectiveness of the collections process. This role involves evaluating agent performance, identifying improvement areas, and implementing strategies to optimize operations. The ideal candidate will drive process enhancements, ensure adherence to regulations, and support a positive customer experience while collaborating with various teams to achieve organizational goals. Act as a liaison between management and the collections team to ensure consistent communication. Knowledge of relevant laws and regulations, including data protection and debt collection practices. • Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. vi. Ability to work independently and collaborate within a team environment.
